Hypenotic The Jekyll Butler

The most awe-inspiring/moving photo series I’ve seen in a while: San Francisco – Pictory

13 Aug 2010
via pictorymag.com

I often feel like moving to other places during and after short visits.

I don’t know if it’s because it’s Friday, after a long, intense week and I’m still at work or what, but this photo-series moved me from ‘moved’ to ‘wanting to move’ pretty forcefully.
